video.title: The First 48: Collection
video.synopsis: The first 48 hours of a homicide investigation are the most important, as detectives gather forensic evidence and seek interviews to solve a case.

episodes.synopsis: In Louisville, Det. Kevin Trees hopes that community outrage will help solve the case of a husband and wife shot in front of their two young children.
episodes.title: Twist of Fate

episodes.synopsis: In Birmingham, Ala., Det. Chris Anderson returns to his childhood neighborhood to investigate the murder of a man killed over 10 pounds of marijuana.
episodes.title: 10 Lbs

episodes.synopsis: A murder hits close to home when Kentucky Det. Rick Arnold learns that the victim of his most recent homicide case is the brother of a good friend.
episodes.title: Alias / Duel

episodes.synopsis: In Cincinnati, detectives investigate the double homicide of a local hairdresser and his elderly neighbor, both stabbed to death and set on fire.
episodes.title: The Stranger / Prince of Darkness

episodes.synopsis: In Birmingham, Dets. Mike Allison and Cynthia Morrow look into a mother's murder; In Louisville, Det. William Brown seeks the killer of four cousins.
episodes.title: Girlfight / Blink of an Eye

episodes.synopsis: In Miami, Detective Anthony Reyes and the homicide team are investigating the murder of a middle-aged mother of four.
episodes.title: Life Snatched

episodes.synopsis: Abraham Alanis and his team investigate the murder of a man who was found robbed and shot to death outside an abandoned house.
episodes.title: Marked for Death

episodes.synopsis: Detective Anthony Reyes and the homicide team are investigating the murder of a man found brutally beaten to death below a major interstate.
episodes.title: Underworld

episodes.synopsis: In Texas, a young man is days away from testifying as a witness in an aggravated assault case when he is suddenly gunned down near his home.
episodes.title: Thicker Than Water

episodes.synopsis: When a store clerk is shot during a robbery, lead detective David Osorio and his team interview witnesses and find that no one knows the shooter.
episodes.title: Terribly Wrong / Setting the Score

episodes.synopsis: When detectives Mickey Cohn and Jon Lesher discover that their two murder victims have matching tattoos, they suspect the murders might be related.
episodes.title: Southwick / Devil's Doorway

episodes.synopsis: To solve a murder, Birmingham detectives must get witnesses to talk; the case of a Charlotte man killed in front of his son takes a strange turn.
episodes.title: Fear Factor / Fall Guy

episodes.synopsis: Birmingham detective Warren Cotton investigates the stabbing deaths of a family; a witness in several homicide investigations is shot in Miami.
episodes.title: Burning Rage / Fallen Soldier

episodes.synopsis: The discovery of a second victim complicates a murder investigation in Miami; DeKalb County detectives reconstruct a victim's last hours.
episodes.title: Love Her Madly / Off Track

episodes.synopsis: Miami detective TC Cepero discovers several reasons behind the deaths of two men who were beaten and shot near an abandoned house.
episodes.title: Caught in the Middle
